name: Planet Invaders (Inworks)
description:
THIS GAME WAS CREATED FOR LUDUM DARE 38

I created a wave survival game set on a tiny planet that you crash landed on. It doesn't get better because on this planet there are drones that attack you and there only goal is to kill you.

Software used:
- Unity Engine 5.6
- Photoshop
- Blender
- http://www.bfxr.net/ (Sound effects)

How to play:
You can edit the controls when you start up the game.
- Shooting = left mouse button
- Forward = z
- Backward = s
- Left = q
- Right = d
- Pause menu = escape
